100.$description: Text action items that are sitting on a lighter background color, like secondary buttons etc.

200.$description: reserved for interactive text, or icons using brand colors.

initial.$description: Text color of hyperlinks throughout the site.

hover.$description: Text color of hyperlinks throughout the site while hovering

visited.$description: Text color of hyperlinks throughout the site that have been visited

initial.$description:
Text color inside of interactive items using the action palette
Use for: Buttons (filled, outline). Button icons

static.$description: For use when a text color will not change between modes

100.$description: Static text with the least amount of emphasis, like disabled text elements or captions.

300.$description: High emphasis static text on page, like page headers or section titles.

initial.$description: The default styling for static text and icons on a page.

inverse.$description: For use in containers that are also using the "inverse" styling. The inverse of the current mode the page is set to.

static.$description: For use when a text color will not change between modes

200.$description: High emphasis text or icon to indicate a danger state, like an error within an input field, etc.

initial.$description: The default color of body danger text within a danger colored container.

inverse.$description: For use in containers that are also using the "inverse" styling. The inverse of the current mode the page is set to.

static.$description: For use when a text color will not change between modes

initial.$description: The default color of body warning text and icons within a warning colored container.

inverse.$description: For use in containers that are also using the "inverse" styling. The inverse of the current mode the page is set to.

static.$description: For use when a text color will not change between modes

initial.$description: The default color of body success text within a success colored container.

inverse.$description: For use in containers that are also using the "inverse" styling. The inverse of the current mode the page is set to.

static.$description: For use when a text color will not change between modes

200.$description: High emphasis text or icon to indicate an info state or highlight information

initial.$description: The default styling for static info text and icons within an info palette container

inverse.$description: For use in containers that are also using the "inverse" styling. The inverse of the current mode the page is set to.

static.$description: For use when a text color will not change between modes

100.$description: Text color inside of interactive items and icons that have an inverse background of the initial token. That may need a different style of emphasis. Use case may vary per product.

200.$description:
Text color inside of interactive items
Use for: Buttons (filled, outline). Button icons that may need a different style of emphasis. Use case may vary per product.

initial.$description:
Text color inside of interactive items
Use for: Buttons (filled, outline). Button icons that may need a different style of emphasis. Use case may vary per product.

static.$description:

Use for: Buttons (filled, outline). Button icons that may need a different style of emphasis. Use case may vary per product.

initial.$description: Text color of hyperlinks throughout the site.

hover.$description: Text color of hyperlinks throughout the site while hovering.

visited.$description: Text color of hyperlinks throughout the site that have been vistited
